subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Crosby, the Pittsburgh Penguins’ captain and the N.H.L.’s reigning most valuable player, said Friday that he was pleased with the way his wrist had responded to treatment over the summer.
snippet: Crosby, the Pittsburgh Penguins’ captain and the N.H.L.’s reigning most valuable player, said Friday that he was pleased with the way his wrist had responded to treatment over the summer.
